overview:
Joe Miller is the founder of Ziligence, which he started in February, 2011 from various coffee shops and his garage in San Francisco.

Joe is responsible for strategic planning, product development, and systems infrastructure at Ziligence.

Prior to founding Ziligence, Joe worked for eight years as an accountant and analyst in the financial services industry. He began Ziligence, like many tech entrepeneurs with enormous passion, a small amount of money, and a clear vision. After reading a quote by Larry Page about the importance of believing in audacious ideas, he became inspired to bring his idea to life.

Joe’s parents reside in Mundelein, IL where his mother is an elementary school principal and father flies private jets. His grandfather, Edward Knaggs, is a renowned research chemist and inventor credited with over 100 patents.

external_links.title: Ziligence Releases Beta 2.0 of Fundamental Data Service
